name: Easy Quinoa and Edamame Salad
author: Plant Based Life
summary: This quinoa and edamame salad is a superfood dream! Packed full of flavor and nutrients, you will want to make this time and time again! This salad can be made as a main dish, side dish, potluck, meal prep--it's pretty much a perfect salad!
ingredients: 1 ½ teaspoons liquid aminos (such as Bragg®)
salt and ground black pepper to taste
½ cup chopped red bell pepper
directions: Combine olive oil, vinegar, maple syrup, sesame oil, liquid amino, lemon juice, garlic, red pepper flakes, salt, and pepper in a mason jar
Seal the lid and shake dressing until fully blended
Place cooked quinoa, edamame, bell pepper, cucumber, carrot, green onion, cranberries in a large mixing bowl
Add 1/2 cup of the dressing and mix until well combined; save any remaining dressing for another use
Place in the refrigerator until chilled, at least 1 hour
Garnished with slivered almonds to serve
